writings.text: 馬には乗ってみよ人には添うてみよ
馬には乗って見よ人には添うて見よ

readings.text: うまにはのってみよひとにはそうてみよ

furigana.writing: 馬には乗ってみよ人には添うてみよ

furigana.writing: 馬には乗って見よ人には添うて見よ

glossary: try a horse by riding him, and judge a man by living with him
you can't judge someone until you've spent time with them
you can't judge something until you've tried it
